id: Seasonal forecast of fire danger indices from the Copernicus Emergency Management Service
description: Modelled daily fire danger time series, driven by seasonal weather forecasts (ECMWF SEAS5) and using fire danger indices from the U.S. Forest Service National Fire-Danger Rating System (NFDRS), the Canadian Forest Service Fire Weather Index Rating System (FWI), and the Australian McArthur (Mark 5) rating systems.
title: Seasonal forecast of fire danger indices from the Copernicus Emergency Management Service
